channel.title: 317 Remake
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i50.tinypic.com/4ptt7b.jpg[/img][/center]
[left][size=18pt][u]Information:[/u][/size][/left] This server will be based on the 317 - 377 version of RuneScape. This server will be mostly based on the ftp maps. This server will contain no custom items besides runescape items that were in the 317 - 377 version of RuneScape. I will try my best to keep the server very neat and clean. Most of the packets will be remade. This server will contain a plain 317 deob for the client. The Client will not contain alot of major updates besides interfaces. The client will have a 317 look and the base for the client will be pablos deob. [b]* Please do not post unless you have something good to say.[/b]
[left][size=18pt][u]Server updates:[/u][/size][/left]
[left][size=18pt][u]Client updates:[/u][/size][/left]
[pre] [b] * None so far[/b][/pre]
[left][size=18pt][u]Media:[/u][/size][/left]
Comming soon,

item.title: 317 Remake
item.dc:creator: @gurlz gurlz
item.description:
@gurlz wrote:

but the fact is the 317 client deob is loading a 377 cache threw class14.java [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2009, 01:11:17 pm[/size][hr]there i rechanged the name now its 317 remake xD

item.title: 317 Remake
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:3, topic:323074”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=419487.msg3082104#msg3082104 date=1262226075]
Looks good, But are you adding the 377 Gameframe or keeping the 317
[/quote]There is no different gameframe for a 377. As far as I remember, the game frame wasn’t changed until some time after Construction, and when it was, the stat text colors were orange and then a brighter yellow.

Good luck with this. I’ve been thinking of trying to make a remake, but brainstorming right now.[/quote]
nice dude, posted while i was posting the same thing.

Also its not a 377 remake without the 377 client this is just 317 loading 377 with replaced sprites.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Remake
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:2, topic:323074”]Looks good, But are you adding the 377 Gameframe or keeping the 317[/quote]There is no different gameframe for a 377. As far as I remember, the game frame wasn’t changed until some time after Construction, and when it was, the stat text colors were orange and then a brighter yellow.

Good luck with this. I’ve been thinking of trying to make a remake, but brainstorming right now.

Read full topic
